name: cosmos-server
description: Cosmos Server is a self-hosted platform that provides a lightweight framework for building and hosting AI-powered services. It simplifies deploying web services using containers with an elegant UI.
features: Container Management: Deploy and manage Docker containers with ease. Simplified orchestration.
Elegant UI: Beautiful interface for service management. Intuitive and modern design.
AI-Powered Services: Framework for hosting AI applications. Future-ready platform.
Lightweight: Minimal resource footprint for efficient operation. Run on modest hardware.
Web Services: Host websites, APIs, and applications effortlessly. All-in-one solution.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your service infrastructure. Privacy and independence.
